"The launch of the all-new 2011 Chrysler 300 and Dodge Charger demonstrates how far this company has come in 18 months," said Sergio Marchionne . The assistance of the governments of Canada and the Province of Ontario gave us the opportunity to create a future. Chrysler Group owes a deep debt of gratitude to taxpayers in Canada and the US for the loans that enabled a vibrant, restructured company to emerge in June 2009. Along with the commitment, dedication and support of our CAW partners and employees, we are demonstrating what can be achieved when industry, government and labor recognize the need to come together. n't be voting for him for president in the next election, she expects to be doing so someday. "I'll vote for him for president when he runs," Shirley Houston said. I'd really like to see him for president. I know he'll make a good governor. Pundits say you can't leave Congress and run for president. I'm not sure that's true. It's all where God wants you to serve. Shirley Houston said that because she knows Mike Pence is a godly man, she is sure he prayed and sought the leadership of the Lord in making his decision not to run for president in 2012.
